抆字的基本解释

抆
wěn
擦：抆泪。

抆字的汉语字典释义

[①]［wěn］
［《廣韻》武粉切，上吻，微。］
［《廣韻》亡運切，去問，微。］
擦拭。参见“抆血”、“抆淚”。

抆字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　抆； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页420第15
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?武粉切，音吻。拭也。又挋也。【前漢·朱博傳】欲洒卿恥，抆拭用禁。【註】摩也。【唐書·李勉傳】居官久，未嘗抆飾器，用車服。　又【玉篇】【唐韻】無運切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】文運切，?音問。義同。

抆字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
抆字的起名意思

暂无。

wipe
Basic explanation of words
wipe
wěn
Wipe: tears.
wipe
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［wěn］
["Guangyun" Wufen cut, kiss on, micro. ]
["Guang Yun" cuts to death, go ask, Wei. ]
wipe. See "blood", "lacrimation".

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Collection] [Hand Character Department] 　抆; Kangxi Strokes: 8; Page Number: Page 420 15
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun]? Wu powder cut, sound kiss. Wipe also.挋 also. [Previous Han·Zhu Bo Biography] If you want to show your shame, you can ban it. [Note] Moriya. [Tang Shu·Li Mian Biography] I have lived as an official for a long time, but I haven't tasted ornaments and used car clothes.　 [Yu Pian] [Tang Yun] No luck cut [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun] Wen Yun cut,? Sound asked. The same meaning.
